Some sexy chicken legs...

“@Valomir: @ChrisMetzen orc peon or alliance worker??”

Peon. 

Work work

“@kathunter: @ChrisMetzen black table linens or red?”

Hahahahahahahah... Stop distracting, dear.

“@DwightCouch: @ChrisMetzen Captain James t or Captain Jean Luke”

Kirk.

“@jhanan: @ChrisMetzen Optimus vs. Thrall?”

Damn... That's like the Gordeon Knot of geek questions...

“@CEMOTucu: @ChrisMetzen Velen or Nobundo?”

Nobundo!!! He has to work for it!!!

“@nateblags: @ChrisMetzen bran, muradin, or magni? lets see some dwarf love!”

Magni! 
...was there just a tremor?

“@Corath: @ChrisMetzen Admiral Akbar vs Grand Moff Tarkin?”

Ackbar!!!! 
Because Tarken can't repel firepower of that magnitude!!!!

“@RorSChk: @ChrisMetzen Day of Tentacle or Monkey Island?”

Love both / but Monkey Island for my nickel...

“@Jezi_Belle: @ChrisMetzen Saurfang or Hellscream (Sr)?”

Love Saurfang, but GROM rules.............................................!

“@maurosuarz: @ChrisMetzen then why it was destroyed with that dwarf forged "ashbringer"? 

If young Uther had had Ashbringer, he'a won...

“@Frozencry: @ChrisMetzen How about The Lich King vs Queen of Blades?”

Queen. I think the Swarm would make short work of the Scourge. :)

“@Dragonours: @ChrisMetzen Nova or Tosh ?”

Nova!

“@Lactarded: @ChrisMetzen cake or pie?”

Cake!

“@Jpearceeee: @ChrisMetzen garrosh or varian???”

I think Gsrrosh has proven to be the bigger a-hole. ...which is an accomplishment.

“@Bezlo: @ChrisMetzen Sauron or Darth Vader?”

Vader

...but Sauron would kick his Sith ass...

“@Salem_AoA: @ChrisMetzen Now here is a real tough one... Horde, or Alliance? :D”

Oh, c'mon....

“@hitstreak: @ChrisMetzen Uther in his prime vs Arthas w/ Frostmourne?”

Think Arthas still would have taken him. Frostmourne was no joke...

“@cooljeff2002: @ChrisMetzen is it true you plan to play every role in the upcoming warcraft movie? :p”

YES!

“@CEMOTucu: @ChrisMetzen In Of Blood and Honor, there's a holy warrior depicted in the church. Is it Tyr?”

As humans imagine him...

“@ShieldofAiur: @ChrisMetzen INCREDIBLE ending to Heart of the Swarm! Such an emotionally powerful cinematic/moment in the story

Thank you!

“@onuxdasilva: @ChrisMetzen greatest villain team up? Zero universe/IP restriction”

Dr. Doom and the Kurgan on a road trip...

“@charonites: @ChrisMetzen Jaina Proudmoore or Lor'themar Theron  in 5.2?”

Lor'themar came out feeling cooler, but Jaina did some Rockin'.

“@helenpforrest: @MLunsted @ChrisMetzen Now Ive had my wow nerdrage we will go back to our regular programming.”

It's good to get it out!

“@Frozencry: @ChrisMetzen Zeratul or Tassadar?”

Zeratul - but I love me some Tassadar!

“@saintstryfe: @ChrisMetzen Ok, now the big one: Thrall v. Queen of Blades”

Queen of Blades... But I don't like it!!!

“@devolore: @chrismetzen Gul'dan or Ner'zhul?”

Gul'dan!!!!

“@JibbyJabby123: @ChrisMetzen Favorite Hero from the blizzard universe? #HardestQuestionOfThemAll”

Umm... Green guy. Big hammer
Suprise? :)

“@greenkamrian: @ChrisMetzen Don't have to give details...but the Alliance as a whole needs love too, not just Varian!”

Love inbound.

“@_jcps: @ChrisMetzen Druid or paladin?”

CLOSE. Love both. 
...paladin.

“@MPickett57: @ChrisMetzen The Banshee Queen or the Queen of Blades?”

Queen of Blades.

“@ChaosSmurf: @ChrisMetzen Kerrigan or Queen of Blades?”

Sarah.

No fair!

Sausages.

That is all.”

/epic

Gotta keep it to 2!

...Protoss!

Thanks, brother. :)

:) maybe one day...

He'd hate it.

Complicated folks....

Thematically it is... IMO :)
Merry Christmas, y'all!
Hold your families close tonight. Love em with everything you've got. It is the only sane response to this... evil.
...guess all you can do is pray for those poor families...
Just heartbroken today... As a father, I'm so fucking angry.

“@beckacs: @ChrisMetzen Isnt Falstad dead??”

Apparently not.....

“@LuckyBestWash: Congrats to @kathunter and @ChrisMetzen for forming the most amazing unholy union of nerd ever.”

Hahaha... Thanks! :)

Justice!

ME TOO!

Kingdom Come (my re-read favorite)

Happy Bday!

Thanks for all the birthday well-wishes, y'all! :) I truly appreciate it. 

Twitter ROCKS for birthdays!....
Lots o' love!

“@rodolfor: @ChrisMetzen @angryorc1 one does not simply walk into Orgrimmar”

Not with ten thousand men could you do this thing...

“@TreeroyWoW: @ChrisMetzen Who's your favourite new character this expansion, lore-wise ofc?”

CHO!

Mixed feelings. :)

“@GuildedLady: @ChrisMetzen @kofteburger They're on Jean Grey's health plan.”

Who would insure HER???

“@AngryOrc1: @ChrisMetzen CAN I KILL GARROSH NOW OR SHOULD I WAIT FOR EVERYONE ELSE?”

Wait. Manners.

“@snack_road: @ChrisMetzen What's the Argent Crusade up to in Northrend these days?”

Staying frosty... (Oh, c'mon! Great pun!)

“@Protokyomi: @ChrisMetzen Is it just me or is the story going all Game of Thrones-ey here soon?”

Just you. No incest anywhere.

“@kofteburger: @ChrisMetzen bruce wayne's parents do.. sorry wrong universe”

:)

“@EmperorIgnacio: @ChrisMetzen is aleria confirmed dead or will we ever see her again?”

Unconfirmed. But that'd be super cool....

“@kibas_paradise: @ChrisMetzen Do pandarians celebrate same holidays? will this be the first winter's veil for them?”

All new for them!

“@kofteburger: @ChrisMetzen is ne'zhul completely gone gone?”

Far as I'm concerned. :)
Does anyone in this universe ever really stay dead?

“@teh_Fresh: @ChrisMetzen Why are some trolls big, and others not? 

Diet. Exercise.

“@r_mt: @ChrisMetzen @aharonvennreth what's in store for the scourge under Bolvar?!?

#perhapscoolerthanarthas”

Thawing. Eventually.......

“@HeinoBrand: @ChrisMetzen Can Angels and Demons experience mortal feelings, like pain - while not being mortal?”

Yes. It's... Complicated.
